Articles.Content:
no further text just watch

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/eDyXIXyAZq0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Well I can't see this thread being controversial in any way at all....

Just in case there's still anyone behind the times, Valve has scrapped this idea (for the time being anyway) and their cut was their usual 30%, the developer set their own rate.

This horse has been thoroughly beaten on reddit by the way, so please keep the discussion here civil ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This thread is not about Valve it's about this ridiculously funny guy Risitas. BTW there are many other versions of that video picking on many other companies ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

This Video almost killed me cause i couldn't stop laughing ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

The guy is pretty infectious ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Or maybe I was just mesmerised by those teeth....

That pretty funny!

Also, paid KSP mods would never work if they were just on steam.

Makes me laugh ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jcXEtKSRI8Y?start=61&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Last night I almost pissed myself. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I love this guy! I watched another one of these videos a couple days ago, but I'm not sure if it's appropriate for the forums. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Makes me laugh ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jcXEtKSRI8Y?start=61&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

One of my most favorite movies / actors.

The coat scene makes me laugh every time ... some day I'm going to pull that on someone.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/70TfU9R09Qg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Omg ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) that is the funniest thing I have ever watched. And I mean it. I'm still laughig 15 minutes later! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Can this be a thing? This should be a thing. The kerbal relevance possibilities are strong. (Well, not in the sense that SQUAD is scamming the players..)

SHOCKING INTERVIEW WITH KERBAL SPACE PROGRAM EMPLOYEE, claims working for someone called "the player"

![pPYiZtJ.png](http://i.imgur.com/pPYiZtJ.png)

From the comments of the video at the top:

"PC Master Card race"

Made me laugh about as much as the video.
